confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.reset: Are you sure you want to reset all data? This cannot be undone.

billingNotInitialized.title: Billing Not Initialized
billingNotInitialized.description: Please configure and initialize billing from the Setup page first.

errorBoundary.title: Something Went Wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred in the application. Please try reloading the page.
errorBoundary.tip1: Check the browser console for more details
errorBoundary.tip2: If the problem persists, try clearing your browser cache
errorBoundary.tip3: Report the issue on GitHub if the error continues
